trans-unit.source: Represents the permissions that can be granted for file access and operations on memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: Representerer tillatelser kan få tilgang til filen og operasjoner i minne er tilordnet filer.

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class specifies the access rights for a memory-mapped file and how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MemoryMappedFileSecurity angir tilgangsrettigheter for en minne-tilordnede fil- og hvordan forsøk på tilgang overvåkes.

trans-unit.source: This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen representerer tilgang og audit som et sett med regler.

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MemoryMappedFileSecurity er en abstrakt av underliggende Microsoft Windows sikkerhet filsystemet.

trans-unit.source: It hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: Mange av detaljer om DACL og SACL skjules.

trans-unit.source: Use the MemoryMappedFileSecurity class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: Bruk MemoryMappedFileSecurity klassen hentes, legge til eller endre tilgangsregler som representerer DACL og SACL for en loddrett strek.

trans-unit.source: To apply new or changed access or audit rules to a memory-mapped file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke nye eller endrede tilgang eller audit regler til en fil som er tilordnet minne, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente tilgang eller audit regler fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> methods take a MemoryMappedFileSecurity object as a parameter: - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>metoder ta et MemoryMappedFileSecurity-objekt som en parameter:- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29></xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"> </xref> klasse.
